text: Brigitte Le Juez (born 5 October 1959) is an author and academic at Dublin City University. ==Published works== * Beckett avant la lettre, Grasset, 2007. * Clerges et cultures populaires, Publications de l'Universite de Saint- Etienne, 2004. * Le Papegai et le papelard dans "Un Cœur simple" de Gustave Flaubert, Rodopi, 1999. * Modern French Short Fiction, Manchester University Press, 1994. * Irlande, Larousse, 1989. ==External links== * Brigitte Le Juez at the European Network for Comparative Literature Studies site Category:Irish scholars and academics Category:1959 births Category:Living people
title: Brigitte Le Juez
